ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Does heritrix3 have ways to extract licensing from webpages
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Maarten, I wasn t aware of this before but I see that archive.org uses rel= license to point to the license of some items. For example:

Hello Maarten,

I wasn't aware of this before but I see that archive.org us=
es
rel=3D"license" to point to the license of some items. For example:
http=
s://archive.org/details/wiki-buzzplanetshoutwikicom_w
Apparently rel=3D"lic=
ense" is a standard: http://microformats.org/wiki/rel-license

Heritrix doe=
s not look for this, but it could, and perhaps include it
in the warc metad=
ata record. Pull requests are welcome.

Noah

[archive-crawler] <archive-crawler@yahoogroup=
s.com> wrote:
